details.bold: Our "Gold Package" includes the use of our Event Space Hall
details.normal: The Grand Ballroom, Small Ballroom, Outdoor Patio, as well as 1 Private Suite with Full Bath

details.bold: Non-alcoholic Beverage Package is also included
details.normal: Coke, Diet Coke, GingerAle, Sprite, Orange Soda, and Water.  Lemon and Limes.  Ice. Hot Coffee and Tea Station.
Gold Chivari Chairs, White Patio Chairs, Round Guest Tables, Banquet Table and Cake Table
3 appetizers(stationed or passed), 2 Main Entrees, 3 Side Dishes, Salad with 1 Dressing, Bread and Butter
We will also provide you with linens, napkins, china, silverware, glassware, acrylic charger, and all serving equipment for food
2 hour set up + 5 hour event time + 2 hour clean up
Venue Supervisor, Banquet Captain, Banquet Servers, Bartenders, and Food Runners.  Set-Up and Breakdown completed by Staff
Complementary Cake Cutting and Champagne Pouring
